alert.note: Alert for Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 2:50AM MST until January 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero between tonight and Tuesday morning at times. * WHERE...Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains and Shirley Basin. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. &&

area.areaDesc: Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin
